scripts.firebase:deploy: pnpm build && rm -rf out && mkdir -p out/_next && cp -r .next/server/app/*.html out/ 2>/dev/null; cp -r .next/static out/_next/; cp -r public/* out/ 2>/dev/null; firebase deploy --only hosting:flowstry-app
scripts.firebase:serve: pnpm build && rm -rf out && mkdir -p out/_next && cp -r .next/server/app/*.html out/ 2>/dev/null; cp -r .next/static out/_next/; cp -r public/* out/ 2>/dev/null; firebase serve --only hosting:flowstry-app
